title: Snowman Paul at the Winter Olympics
description: Go for the Gold with Snowman Paul!"A celebration of...an eternal favorite childhood Olympic Glory"-- Kirkus ReviewsThe Winter Games present an opportunity to teach children important lessons about resilience, teamwork, and honesty in competitive sports.In this rhyming and stunningly illustrated sports adventure for kids, Snowman Paul gets to compete on the world stage and conquers the Winter Olympics by storm.But wait, is he competing fairly, or is he getting some extra help from his friends?This award-winning Olympic tale told in verse will be enjoyed by children, parents, and grandparents alike.It is a fun and educational way to prepare your kids for the fast-approaching 2022 Winter Games.Perfect for bedtime and read-aloud time, it is a great holiday gift, and it will inspire your young athletes all year long."The Snowman Paul book series will hook, engage and delight your little ones and make them fall in love with reading.", Alinka Rutkowska, USA Today best-selling authorScroll up and grab your copy now!
author: Yossi Lapid
